comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Gladys Adams married Charles Lee Crutchfield in August 1915; she was a niece of Lady Patricia Ross (an American from Kentucky who married a Scotsman), and doing relief work for the British Army; the groom was from Nashville TN and worked on Wall Street.  Looks like she had at least one child, and died in 1973, in Florida.
